layout_strategy.spacing: Compact but breathable (p-4 to p-6 for containers, gap-4 for grids)
layout_strategy.containers: Rounded-lg (0.5rem) or Rounded-none for strict industrial look. Border-collapse style for data grids.

buttons.primary: bg-amber-600 hover:bg-amber-500 text-white font-medium rounded-md shadow-[0_0_10px_rgba(245,158,11,0.2)] transition-all

cards.default: bg-zinc-900/80 border border-zinc-800/50 backdrop-blur-sm rounded-lg p-5

badges.base: inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium border

media.icons: Lucide React (default) or Phosphor Icons (for technical feel)

libraries.3d: React Three Fiber (for specific 3D object inspection if needed, otherwise Mapbox for terrain)

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement a strict Dark Mode by default. Do not create a light mode toggle unless requested.
Use the 'Bento Grid' layout for the main dashboard to organize dense data.
Prioritize 'Manrope' for UI text and 'JetBrains Mono' for all numerical data and sensor readings.
Use the provided image URLs for the Drone Feed and Digital Twin placeholders.
Ensure all alerts have a clear visual hierarchy (Red > Amber > Blue > Green).
Create a 'DigitalTwinViewer' component that acts as the centerpiece of the dashboard.
Mock real-time data updates using `setInterval` to simulate sensor fluctuations.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
